Description:
We are pleased to announce the establishment of two new rules for content AI in SharePoint. These rules can be triggered by a change in column data or the addition of a file to a SharePoint library. They will enable users to apply a retention policy and a sensitivity label, as predefined in Purview, to documents that meet the specified conditions.
GA date: August CY2025
Title: SharePoint: New Content AI Rules in SharePoint to set sensitivity labels and retention policy
